steps.title: Create Abandoned Cart Drip
steps.prompt:
Create abandoned cart drip campaign triggered on cart.abandoned:
- 1 hour: Reminder template cart_reminder_1 subject '{{first_name}}, You Left Something Behind'
- 24 hours: Discount template cart_discount subject 'Save 10% on Your Cart'
- 72 hours: Final template cart_final subject 'Last Chance - Your Cart Expires Soon'

steps.title: Activate Campaign
steps.prompt: Activate the abandoned cart drip campaign

steps.title: Monitor Recovery Rate
steps.prompt: Show me recovery rate for abandoned cart campaign
steps.notes: Check after 7+ days for meaningful data
